name: ListAppServiceAccounts
description:
Retrieve all app service accounts from Okta.

Use this tool to list all application service accounts in Okta's privileged-access API. It helps to manage and monitor service account details efficiently.

parameters.name: number_of_accounts_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of app service accounts to return in the response.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: An opaque string for pagination, indicating current position in the list. Obtained from the `Link` response header.

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: search_account_value
parameters.description: Provides a search string to filter app service accounts by name, username, instance label, or key name.

value_schema.description: Searches for app service accounts where the account name (`name`), username (`username`), app instance label (`containerInstanceName`), or OIN app key name (`containerGlobalName`) contains the given value

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

value_schema.description: The cursor to use for pagination. It is an opaque string that specifies your current location in the list and is obtained from the `Link` response header. See [Pagination](https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/#pagination).

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Searches for app service accounts where the account name (`name`), username (`username`), app instance label (`containerInstanceName`), or OIN app key name (`containerGlobalName`) contains the given value

value_schema.description: Searches for app service accounts where the account name (`name`), username (`username`), app instance label (`containerInstanceName`), or OIN app key name (`containerGlobalName`) contains the given value

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
